hero.name: Your Name
hero.title: Front-end Developer
hero.description: Specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences with React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and React Native.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know my story
about.paragraph1: I'm a front-end developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional user interfaces. With experience in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and React Native, I've worked on various projects that have allowed me to enhance my skills and knowledge.
about.paragraph2: My goal is always to deliver high-quality products that provide the best possible experience to users. I'm constantly learning new technologies and methodologies to stay updated in the ever-evolving world of web development.
about.name: Name

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: These are the technologies and tools I work with on a daily basis.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently.

project1.title: Modern E-commerce
project1.description: A complete e-commerce with shopping cart, payments, and admin dashboard.

project2.title: Delivery App
project2.description: A mobile app for food ordering with real-time tracking.

project3.title: Analytics Dashboard
project3.description: An interactive dashboard for data visualization and business metrics.

job1.description: Leading the development of web applications with React and Next.js.
responsibilities: Development of responsive and accessible user interfaces
Implementation of new features and maintenance of existing code
Collaboration with designers and back-end developers

job2.description: Working on web and mobile projects with React and React Native.
responsibilities: Development of web applications with React.js and TypeScript
Creation of mobile apps with React Native
Optimization of performance and user experience

job3.description: Starting my career with front-end web development.
responsibilities: Development of interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Learning and application of modern frameworks

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Let's talk about how I can help.
contact.contactText: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to contact me through any of the means below or by filling out the form.
contact.successMessage: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
